t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Unbelievable... Those sirens were not willing to help me solve this problem.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: And they claim it can't be resolved? They're probably idiots who say the cake is a lie.
You want to turn off this spell? Why do you want to do so?

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Just look at me. Not only do I look ugly, this hairstyle is ridiculous!

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't want my people to see me like this. They'll probably be horrified by it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Kanako and Suwako ran away from me because of it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You think super long hair is scary? It's beautiful!

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: But I don't. I'd be perfect for Halloween. I wouldn't need to dress up to scare people.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Despite my comments, my magic protects my body from such enchantments.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Just look at the state of me. I look horrible. I scared myself the first time I saw myself like this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Queen Marisa is enough, and so is Queen Yukari and Empress Kaguya.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Would you be a ruler of the province you live in?

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'd say so, but you're not helping me find a solution to it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Want a solution? I'll have to deal with your ugly face.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This is all I needed. A game of danmaku. Every night I have nightmares about this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This madness will never seem to end, just when you think incidents can't get any worse!
